items.title: The Securities That Banks Are Backing Away From: Credit Weekly
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- US banks, among the few companies that still sell preferred shares, are following JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s lead and retreating from the securities, even as investors are eager to buy them.
